node.title: You find that you are the only one left in your department on the week between the Holidays. Do you:
node.author: gregor42

data.field: Use the time to catch up on work Use the time to bone up on Perl Use the time to goof off on PerlMonks Eat a lot of pastries Time? What time? I have work to do! Invent some work to justify yourself (consultant) Clean everything in sight Play nerf football with the network guys in the hall Craft cunning booby-traps for your missing coworkers Finally get around to writing that killer module you've always wanted to Zzzzzzzz.... Do something else
